translations: n.（动物的）尸体；架子（等于 carcass）

sentences.sentence: But as for you, your carcases, they shall fall in this wilderness.
sentences.translation: 至于你们，你们的尸首必倒在这旷野。

sentences.sentence: And I will lay the dead carcases of the children of Israel before their idols; and I will scatter your bones round about your altars.
sentences.translation: 我也要将以色列人的尸首放在他们的偶像面前，将你们的骸骨抛散在你们祭坛的四围。

sentences.sentence: Their slain also shall be cast out, and their stink shall come up out of their carcases, and the mountains shall be melted with their blood.
sentences.translation: 被杀的必然抛弃，尸首臭气上腾。诸山被他们的血融化。
